name: Dungeon Demolisher
description:
This was made in conjunction with the Brackeys Gam Jam 2023.1, where the theme given was "An end is a new beginning".

For this, I came up with a platformer that when the player is killed by an enemy, the player will be offered the choice to do more or take less damage, depending on what choice they make. 

Despite the game jam being run for 6 days, I was only able to take part for the last few days, but despite this, I feel like it came out pretty well for the time constraints.

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated, and I thank you for choosing to play this experience that I have created
